description: head (fully realized) and torso (sketched) of man in 3/4 view, with arms crossed; man has long disheveled hair and small beard
provenance: [Allinson Gallery, Inc., Storrs, Connecticut, until 2008; sold in April for RRTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2008-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [Whistler 1859.]; bottom center, in the print: [Drouet Sculpteur]
title: Drouet
